footer.all: All week long from 10 AM – 10 PM

download.firstp: DOWNLOAD THE XCLUSIVES APP FOR OUR FULL MERCHANT NETWORK!
download.secondp: Download the app now and enjoy over 200 additional instant deals exclusive only to app members!

home.at any of our merchants from our network: at any of our merchants from our network
home.Booklet with your card along with access: Booklet with your card along with access to the
home.DISCOUNTS p: While shopping at any merchant from our network, present your Xclusives Card® to the cashier to receive a discount or refund of up to 35%
home.access p: Your Xclusives membership also comes with free access to the Monthly Deals section in the  Xclusives App, where you can enjoy additional privileges on a monthly basis
home.app p: The Xclusives App compliments your Xclusives Card®, so be sure to download and utilize it to get the maximum  benefit from your Xclusives membership!
home.merchant p: All your favorite merchants, their respective branch locations and their current running deals are all at your fingertips!
home.extensive p: Find merchants that meet your exact needs! Filter our merchant network by geographic location, distance,  category, features, and much more!
home.remind p: Never forget to use your Xclusives privileges ever again! You will get reminded of your expiring  privileges  automatically or you can always set your own reminders!
home.Monthly Deals p: In addition to your main Xclusives Card® privileges, Monthly Deals offer additional privilege to you on a  monthly basis! Don't forget to check back every month for fresh new deals!
home.flash Deals p: Enjoy unique limited-time deals that are updated regularly! Flash deals don't require an Xclusives  membership to be redeemed and can be used by anyone who downloads the app for free!
home.WALLET p: Track all your Xclusives savings, refund vouchers, and redemptions all in one place!
home.start p: Just get the card, download the app, and enjoy a world of never-ending privilege!

works.Become an Xclusives member now and enjoy: Become an Xclusives member now and enjoy the following privileges
works.fisrtp: Your Xclusives Card® entitles you to up to 35% discounts and refunds at any of our merchants from our network! Just simply present your card while paying at the cashier and, depending on the merchant, you will get either:
works.worksulli1: An instant discount of up to 35%
works.worksulli2: A refund voucher of up to 35% of your total bill (tax excluded) redeemable on your next visit
works.xckusive app firstp: The Xclusives App compliments your Xclusives Card®, so be sure to download and utilize it to get the maximum benefit from your Xclusives membership
works.xckusive app secondp: Enjoy over 200 additional instant monthly deals exclusive only to Xclusives members

cards.p: JUST FILL IN THE FOLLOWING FORM TO GET YOUR XCLUSIVES CARD® NOW
cards.p2: One of our representatives will contact you within 48 hours to assist you with your membership

downloads.p1: The Xclusives App compliments your Xclusives Card®, so be sure to download and utilize it to get the maximum benefit from your Xclusives membership
downloads.p2: Don’t have an Xclusives Card yet? You can get one by clicking here or you can still enjoy some features of the app for free like the Flash Deals
